data.message: Hello Facebook My friend's friend account was created in 2016 has been asked to confirm the identity at that time has been confirmed identity required and reactivated the account at that time either now has been disabled prudently 10 days ago and the steps have been followed but the account has not been reactivated I know why I hope you solve this problem

replies.message: Hey جلال جاسم. Blocks are temporary and can last a few hours or a few days. Please sit tight while the ban is in place. For more information, visit: http://bit.ly/2t7FzUl. -Ashley
